text: yatoru (putiya) attiyayam irakkappattal avarkal oruvaraiyoruvar nokki' "unkalai yaravatu parttu vittarkalo?" Enru kettuk konte tirumpi(p poy) vitukinranar; allah avarkalutaiya nencankalai (oliyin pakkattiliruntu) tiruppi vittan - (karanamennavenil) avarkal cattiyattai arintu kolla mutiyata makkalaka irukkinranar
